C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

command: for dir in keys echo-keys faucet-keys; do [ -d /$dir ] && /bin/cp /$dir/* /wallet-keys; done; /bin/chmod 0700 /wallet-keys
initContainers.name: fix-perms

command: for key in key echo-key faucet-key; do [ ! -f /root/wallet-keys/$key ] || mina accounts import -config-directory /root/.mina-config -privkey-path /root/wallet-keys/$key; done
initContainers.name: install-key
